MemoryDataSource Class Reference

Provides a volitile in-memory distributable memory storage. Note the becouse memcache is implemented in the model layer, this can be used for a distributed memory session storage data source. More...

#import <MemoryDataSource.h>

Inheritance diagram for MemoryDataSource:

List of all members.

Protected Attributes

NSMutableDictionary * m_memory_storage

Detailed Description

Provides a volitile in-memory distributable memory storage. Note the becouse memcache is implemented in the model layer, this can be used for a distributed memory session storage data source.

NOTES: Currently not all of the WebDataSource protocal is supported. What works: -create/update/delete/get What does not work (YET): Conditional queries
